ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.cfg
Class AppConfigsResource

java.lang.Object
  endpoint.Resource
      endpoint.LocalResource
          ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.cfg.AppConfigsResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
coap.RequestHandler
public class AppConfigsResource
extends endpoint.LocalResource

AppConfigResource contains the app's configs' resources. When an app is created, the corresponding resource will be added to the AppConfigsResource.

The parent of a AppConfigsResource is supposed to be an AppResource. When an app gets deleted, all configs correspondig to this app will be removed from AppConfigsResource by its AppResource parent.

On a GET reqeust, it AppConfigResource lists all configs it contains. POST, PUT and DELETE are not allowed.

Author:
Martin Lanter
